__e: I'm looking for any lead on the boys who killed my son.
The only fool... bigger than one seeking information about that witch... is the fool willing to provide it.
I'm deeply sorry about your loss, but I may have some information about the person that came after you.
One of us had to get this important piece of intelligence out.
Because you called and told naval intelligence.
I miss Marine Intelligence, though you're a lot prettier.
